recommendations: Karla H.R “I was the intern coordinator at The Global Education & Leadership Foundation for almost 2 years, Atish is one of the interns I definitely remember the most. While at tGELF, Atish showed great commitment to all the tasks that were given to him, he is an independent worker and also a good team player, a combination that it is difficult to find. He worked on different projects showing commitment, a great sense of responsibility and and efficiency. Embrace ambiguity is one of the strongest assets that Atish holds, even though some projects did not have all the clarity that was needed, he was always asking questions and being comfortable with the unknown. Working with Atish was an amazing and rewarding opportunity, he is a brilliant young man with a bright future ahead, full of innovative ideas and sharp critical thinking. ”

Sarthak Sachdeva “Aitsh is a very hard-working and dedicated individual. He's really reliable when it comes to getting the job done as he treats his work as his first priority. It has been a pleasure working with him and I hope we get a chance to work together again!”

volunteer_experience.info: Coached 10 underprivileged kids from class 8-12 within the campus 6 days a week; 5 students scored more than 80% in class 10th board examination held in March 2018

volunteer_experience.info: Conducted interactive sessions twice a month with the local school children; Encouraged them to adopt healthy habits, guided them on various career paths and organized many skill-based activities.
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Adore India
volunteer_experience.title: Community Volunteer

volunteer_experience.info: - Facilitated a team of 30 and successfully organized 4 MUN conferences along with two inter-university conferences with the participation of 350+ delegates in each- Coordinated the fundraising of INR 65,000 and partnership with the Akshaya Patra for the event and worked on designing the annual budget with the finance department of the society
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Thapar MUN Society
volunteer_experience.title: President

volunteer_experience.info: - Led a team of 50 social entrepreneurs and successfully completed "Project Mushroomed"- Founded the first-ever social entrepreneurship fest “Enactus Day" attended by 500+ students all around the country- Organized National Volunteering Week under India @ 75, Mission 2022 with CII and TATA Sustainability group in Patiala
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Enactus Thapar
volunteer_experience.title: President

volunteer_experience.info: - Selected in a team of 70 people out of 1200+ students- Counseled more than 1000 students and parents regarding the admissions for the batch of 2022- Organized the fresher’s week for more than 2000 students
volunteer_experience.subtitle: Frosh TIET
volunteer_experience.title: Career Counselor

projects: [{"title":"Emojinator- Emoji detector","start_date":"Sep 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"Emojinator is an emoji classifier plugin for the keyboard. It eases the user’s way of finding the right emoji. The user has to simply make a facial expression and emojinator converts that expression to a suitable emoji for further use. The user opens the keyboard and initiates the emojinator by simply clicking on the emoji button."},{"title":"Agricultural Spraying System for Precision Farming and Effective Pest Control","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"Dec 2020","description":"Lead a team of 4, designed a drone using CAD Modelling and built a machine learning model based on Transfer Learning technique to detect the crop disease and deployed the model on a flutter based mobile application: AgroVision"},{},{"title":"COVID 19 Predictions During Pandemic","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Lead a team of 3, did the predictions of COVID 19 cases from the beginning of the pandemic till July 2020 for the semester course. Explored various machine learning models like decision tree, random forest, LSTM, linear and polynomial regression."},{},{},{"title":"Entrepreneurial Project","start_date":"Jan 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Built a business model for a B2C company named \"All in1 Store\" that offers subscription-based daily essentials and conducted the value chain analysis and documented the process involved to set it up, our team of 5 members was selected among top 3 best startup ideas in a batch of 1000 students and awarded with grade A in the course"},{},{},{},{},{"title":"Project Mushroomed (Community Project)","start_date":"Aug 2017","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"Project Mushroomed | Enactus Thapar's initiative was completed for solving India's emerging environmental problem \"Stubble Burning\" which is prevalent in most parts of the country. The idea was to use stubble along with agricultural waste to naturally grow mushrooms.The impact was that 5 farming families from the village Miranpur earned profits of INR 1,00,000 per family during the whole mushroom season"},{}]
